books.title: The Girl Who Could Not Stop Laughing
books.author: Meera Ganapathi
books.description: Every day T. Sundari gets into trouble because most things make her laugh. She just cannot keep her mouth sealed. T. Sundari wants to know if something is wrong with her. Because if there isn't, she can laugh all the time!

books.title: The Case of the Missing Water
books.author: Shalini Srinivasan
books.description: When the tank in Ranj’s village dries up, she sets out on a mission to find the missing water. Join Detective Ranj on the case.

books.title: Ammachi's Amazing Machines
books.author: Rajiv Eipe
books.description: Sooraj and his grandma LOVE inventing! Join them on their latest adventure: using simple machines to make coconut barfi!

books.title: Rose and Rocky's War On Insects
books.author: Annie Beasnt
books.description: Rose and Rocky hate insects because they bite and sting. What makes them change their mind? Join Rose and Rocky in their adventures in this fun book about insects.

books.title: The Night the Moon Went Missing
books.author: Shreya Yadav
books.description: When the moon doesn’t rise from the sea one night, it is up to Maisha and her friend Uchli the flying fish to find her. But how can they look for the moon without any light?

books.title: Annual Haircut Day
books.author: Rohini Nilekani
books.description: Sringeri Srinivas, the lovable farmer with very long hair, wants it cut on Annual Haircut Day. But, everyone is busy. Read this story to find out who helps him get a haircut.

books.title: What's Neema Eating Today?
books.author: Bijal Vachharajani
books.description: Meet Neema who LOVES to eat. Slippery lychees, squishy jamuns, sour tamarinds, shiny spinach – she loves it all! Join Neema as she chews and chomps her way through the year.

books.title: Rabbit Becomes a Chef
books.author: Chammi Iresha
books.description: Raw carrots for breakfast. Raw carrots for lunch. Raw carrots for dinner. Rabbit is tired of eating raw carrots and wants to learn how to cook them into a tasty curry.

books.title: Jadav and the Tree-Place
books.author: Vinayak Varma
books.description: Jadav has the best job in the world: he makes forests! How does he do it? Read this book to find out!

books.title: The Plant Whisperer
books.author: Sayantan Datta
books.description: Young Jaishree loves nothing more than plants. She wants to understand them, which is why she decides to spend her life studying plants. This biography of ecologist Dr H Jaishree Subrahmaniam is a story of passion and gumption.

books.title: How Does the Toothpaste Get into the Tube?
books.author: Veena Prasad
books.description: Squeezing out the toothpaste from the tube every morning is simple. But do you know how it got into the tube? Let's tell you how.

books.title: Let's Fly a Plane
books.author: Anjna Singh
books.description: Have you ever dreamed of being a pilot? Open this book, step into the cockpit and let’s fly an aeroplane!

books.title: The Boy and the Drum
books.author: Umesh P N
books.description: A folktale about giving and kindness transforms into a lively play! This versatile and adaptable piece can be performed on stage or in the classroom. Hours of fun and learning guaranteed!

books.title: Life of Shoes
books.author: Nozuko Mkizwana
books.description: A story from the perspective of shoes. (This story was originally created at a storybook development workshop with 22 educators, in February 2019, in partnership with the British Council and Department of Basic Education, South Africa).

books.title: Behind the Lie
books.author: Asha Nehemiah
books.description: Valli and Ramesh live under a cloud of fear because of their father, who has a frightening temper. Will things ever change for them? A story about domestic violence, grit and hope.

books.title: The Tale of the Toilet
books.author: Veena Prasad
books.description: Number one or number two, they are always big jobs! But do you ever wonder what toilets looked like in the olden times? And are they different in other countries? Get ready to take a peek into toilets across space and time!

books.title: Jackpot
books.author: Munshi Premchand
books.description: Vikram has high and lofty dreams. He wants to travel the world like a prince and build a library that's unparalleled in its glory. But Vikram can't be bothered with working hard to earn his desires. He looks for the easy way to attain his dreams, and hence proceeds to buy a lottery ticket. Does he win the lottery and finally travel the world? Or does his life begin to crumble due to his thirst and greed for easy money?

books.title: Mr Motaung's thirds
books.author: African Storybook and Lindiwe Tshabalala
books.description: A story about thirds, and lunch.

books.title: A Library Story
books.author: African Storybook and Lindiwe Tshabalala
books.description: Seema’s school will finally have a library. But they still need 40% more money to buy books. Join Seema and her classmates as they raise funds for the library and learn the concept of percentages.

books.title: Crackers in a Pot
books.author: It is Ramapada’s birthday, Dashu’s greatest rival in school. Ramapada walks in with a pot filled with delicious sweets and shares them with everyone but Dashu. Dashu isn’t known to be crazy for no reason! What prank does Dashu come up with in return this time?
books.description: A story about a birthday celebration and friendship.

books.title: Kallu's world 4 - Hero Horoscope Man
books.author: Subhadra Sen Gupta
books.description: Welcome to Khajuria – a village where young Kallu and his gang run delightful adventurous riots almost everyday. Sometimes they question village traditions, defy bullies or just go about their daily business, but Kallu and his gang are up for anything. Join them as they grow wiser and wittier, happily roaming the village finding new things to do, and see what they come up with! A world renowned 'Astrologer – Palmist – Tantra Expert  – Futurologist – Numerologist...etc' is visiting the village. What could he predict other than the future... class test questions perhaps? Or perform a few magic tricks? What happens when Kallu's gang decides to check out the 'horoscope man'? No need to go to an astrologer to find out. Just read on…

books.title: Home
books.author: Fausto Aarya De Santis
books.description: Hasina and her family live happily in their rainy village. Until one day the tides turn, and Amma and young Hasina are swept away by fear. They join a river of escaping people. They become refugees in a new country, away from everything that is familiar. A story that explores the meaning of home.

books.title: Truth Untold
books.author: Sumedha Nath
books.description: What is the truth? Is it what's happening in reality or is it what's going on behind the scenes?

books.title: The Postmaster
books.author: Rabindranath Tagore
books.description: The postmaster and Ratan, hailing from different worlds, build their cosy home on compassion and empathy. However, the postmaster has applied to leave the village. Read this poignant story by Tagore that explores a relationship without a name and leaves your heart aching for Ratan.

books.title: Cashed in
books.author: Saanvi Roshan Shetty
books.description: The story, set in the English city of Cambridge in 1854, is about two families. The Wilkins go into debt and lose everything, while their close friends, the Winsdors, refuse to lend them money. Elliot Winsdor, the head of the family who made the decision not to help the Wilkins out, gets a conveniently timed nightmare that teaches him kindness and understanding.

books.title: Ambi's Little Things
books.author: Eleanor Sangma
books.description: Join Chimik and her mother on a heartfelt journey of love, laughter, and tears. When they lose someone dear, they find courage and joy in the smallest things. Together they dance, sing, and celebrate life, even as they say goodbye.

books.title: Together We're Strong: The Story of Albertina Sisulu
books.author: Liesl Jobson
books.description: From the day she was born to the day she died, Albertina Sisulu lived a life of love and sacrifice. A brave girl who rode a horse, she was a blessing to her family, to her community and to South Africa. This story of a unique and powerful woman, who stood up for her beliefs no matter what, will inspire and enchant.

books.title: The Pig With The Runaway Tail
books.author: Parinita Shetty
books.description: Pongal the pig has a bit of a problem. Her tail keeps running off on its own to have an adventure! Help Pongal find her runaway tail in this spotting book.

books.title: The Magic Block
books.author: Lavina Mahbubani
books.description: Bhaiya's special pen rolls under the bed. Rinky tries to get it back but she can’t reach it! Will a little black block be able to help her?

books.title: The Very Wiggly Tooth
books.author: Reshma Thapa Gurung
books.description: Bunu’s loose tooth refuses to come out! Learn how, with a little help from a Himalayan folktale, Bunu loses her tooth.

books.title: Why is There a Hole in the Wall?
books.author: Kirsty Paxton
books.description: “Why is there a hole in the wall?” Lungisa asks. He gets lots of interesting answers… but he keeps on asking.

books.title: Girisha from the Hills
books.author: Nazia Jabeen
books.description: When a wild elephant turns up in Girisha’s village, people are afraid, but not Girisha. She is brave. What do you think she will do to calm the elephant?

books.title: Secret Owner
books.author: Subashini Godage
books.description: A bag has been stolen but nobody admits to stealing it. How will the Arachchi official find the real thief?

books.title: Grandma's Glasses
books.author: Rohini Nilekani
books.description: Grandma loses her glasses all the time. Sometimes she needs a smart detective to find them for her!

books.title: There's an alien in my house!
books.author: Refi loe Moahloli
books.description: What do you do when there’s an alien in your house? Fight a foe or find a friend?

books.title: Sani, the Beautiful Little Girl
books.author: Dhruva Ghimire
books.description: Little Sani wants to go out and she has to look beautiful. She decides to put on her mother's makeup. Will she look beautiful in the end? Read on to find out.

books.title: The Happy Train
books.author: Humayan Rashid
books.description: The Happy Train is a story about the journey of train that ventures far from home into a dark, scary forest and becomes frightened. How do you think the train will overcome her fears?

books.title: Best Foot Forward
books.author: Rustom Dadachanji
books.description: Mr. Centipede wears 21 pairs of boots on his morning walk. But with so many legs to choose from, how does he know which foot to use first? Join Mr. Centipede and his garden friends in this story about counting and indecision!

books.title: Puppy Hears a Noise
books.author: Chandana Bandara Samarakoon
books.description: A puppy hears an awful noise that disturbs his sleep at night. He tries to find out who is making the noise. Where do you think the noise is coming from?

books.title: Goby's Noisy Best Friend
books.author: Sheila Dhir
books.description: Legless Goby and noisy Snap are best friends who live together in a burrow deep in the ocean. What happens when Goby gets tired of Snap’s loud claws?

books.title: Brushing is No Fun!
books.author: Srividhya Venkat
books.description: Rohan does not like to brush his teeth or take a bath. But his sister Riya tells him a secret that changes his mind!

books.title: Counting Cabbages
books.author: Penelope Smith
books.description: A Maths story about counting and sharing.

books.title: Sweet Sunday
books.author: Geetha Rao
books.description: Bhaiya's special pen rolls under the bed. Rinky tries to get it back but she can’t reach it! Will a little black block be able to help her?

books.title: Welcome to the Forest
books.author: Bhavna Menon
books.description: Tulsa is off to Kanha Tiger Reserve with her school friends. Along with the forest officials, the students experience the jungle in a unique and exciting way.

books.title: Circles
books.author: Alex Latimer, Gordon Latimer and Patrick Latimer
books.description: Mother Vulture takes Little Vulture on his first flight. On their journey, they see a dying gemsbok. She shows her son that the end of one animal’s life is also the beginning of a new cycle for other creatures.

books.title: Stage Fright
books.author: Yamini Vijayan
books.description: Champa loves to sing. But she can’t sing on stage. Will she be able to face the huge crowd on her school’s Annual Day?

books.title: When I Grow Up
books.author: Priyadarshini Gogoi
books.description: I am Papori and I will be an engineer when I grow up. This book is about all the things I will build. It is full of big words, but it is full of big adventures too. Come join me!

books.title: Annual Haircut Day - ONCE AGAIN!
books.author: Rohini Nilekani
books.description: Sringeri Srinivas is back! It is Annual Haircut Day, once again. But there is a lockdown in his village due to the Coronavirus pandemic. The barbershop is closed. What will the lovable banana farmer do this time?

books.title: Password, please?
books.author: Vahishta Mistry
books.description: Manju wants to play games on her cousin’s phone. But it’s locked with a password! Here is a book that introduces readers to the concept of passwords as a key to guard information. To find out more, open the book; you don’t need a password for that!
